BUStools
========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which BUStools installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using BUStools, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load BUStools/0.43.1-GCCcore-11.3.0
```
